column5: PYX someone keeps pumping this garbage at 1750 so it doesnt enter the abyss

PYX Will we not always have a large short position with so much institutional ownership I thought institutions hedge their large positions by purchasing put options So as the stock price rises wont they buy more higher strike put options I think there will not be as big a short squeeze as the large short percentage indicates due to the large institutional ownership
IFRX PYX low floaters with huge gaps to fill
PYX Nice bounce Weakies sold out yesterday

PYX Perfect conditions for that squeeze to come next week 25 million shares short in total vs 9 million total float with only 3 million public float Recent low volume accumulation may signal stronger hands particularly with the volatility here Plus there is heavy open interest in June calls at 20 and 225 with little open interest in puts which makes sense since this looks to have bottomed recently in 16s Catalyst coming soon with ER likely next week Just waiting on PYX to officially announce ER date Hoping to double my 40k after we get some new revenue growth reported coupled with optimistic future guidance which should be fairly expected given new markets they have recently entered Shorts better hurry to close positions before this gaps up on just an okay ER We dont need much buying pressure to trigger a squeeze under these conditions Recent tobacco earnings also show strength see UVV so this could be an absolutely monstrous short squeeze a la Tilray
PYX looks like bullish divergance on daily RSI Nice The same as TLRY Going to the the moon soon
PYX Maybe instead of Dan Aykroyd in the motor boat just put the little rocket

PYX 8K says PYX will produce 168K Kg of cannabis in 2021 Revenue for 168000 Kg of Cannabis calculates to 300 million in revenue at bulk prices and 800 million in revenue at retail prices Dividing these by 9 million shares results in 33 to 88 per share of revenue That has to improve the bottom line net profit significantly They also will have CBD and THC oil extractions etc
im a PYX XRPX kinda guy fyi
PYX i want my 15 gains already
